items.name: Sean O'Day
items.text: This has to be one of the Best Companies in Alabama, Be Sure to Call DJCservices LLC for any remodeling Jobs

items.name: William Carlisle
items.text: They do great custom decks and showers highly recommend.

items.name: Roger Keene
items.text: Dennis is fantastic and does quality work. He is very responsive and reliable. Sunday I had a water pipe bust 30 minutes before I needed to leave for the airport. I called Dennis and he was there and had it fixed before I needed to leave.
